block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$265,000 319 West 18th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 550-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors, live-in super; maintenance $481, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $265,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Eychner)

$270,000 201 East 21st Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, new windows, c/a, 2 exposures; maintenance $644, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $269,000 (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

$290,000 11 Fifth Avenue (Eighth St.) 634-sq.-ft. studio co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $505, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $290,000, 15 weeks on market (Broker: Ashforth Warburg)

$355,000 631 First Avenue (36th Street) (Manhattan Place) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 756-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, h/w floors, East River view, health club in building; common charge $417, taxes $3,469; listed at $355,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Susan D. Fine; Halstead Property Co.)

$875,000 1080 Madison Avenue (81st Street) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,450-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, double-height ceilings, balcony; common charge $1,514, taxes $8,799; listed at $875,000, 1 week on market (Broker: G. Laurie Cooper)

$343,000 7 Dash Place 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 85-year-old detached house; dining room, sun room, solarium, full basement, 1-car garage, 48-by-64-ft. lot; taxes $2,100; listed at $350,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Trebach)

$392,000 194 Marine Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 70-year-old semiattached brick and wood-frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, semifinished basement, 2-car garage, 25-by-100-ft. corner lot; taxes $2,097; listed at $418,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21/DeMasi)

$460,000 309 Garfield Place 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; high ceilings, h/w floors, fireplace, private deck, washer/dryer in unit; maintenance $623, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $475,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$440,000 171 Westminster Road 6-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 99-year-old detached colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, tin ceilings, fireplace, parquet floors, 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,360; listed at $500,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Mary Kay Gallagher)

$310,000 68-24 Dartmouth Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 65-year-old attached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, semifinished basement, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,300; listed at $320,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Advantage Forest Hills)

$362,000 217-15 85th Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 52-year-old expanded Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, slate roof, 1-car garage, 50-by-92-ft. corner lot; taxes $2,600; listed at $379,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Goller & Costi)

$185,000 90 Green Valley Road 2-family, 17-year-old semiattached vinyl-sided house; 3 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room in primary duplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in simplex; c/a, off-street parking; taxes $1,831; listed at $199,900, 1 week on market (Broker: Salmon)

$640,000 24 Pond Lane 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 40-year-old ranch; entry hall, sun room, fireplace, cathedral ceilings, eat-in kitchen, screened porch, skylights, 1.5-acre lot; taxes $8,980; listed at $675,000, 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Dwyer; Houlihan/ Lawrence)

$731,738 4 Pearl Court 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 5-year-old colonial; 2-story foyer, office, eat-in kitchen, deck, dining room, veranda, mahogany floors; 2.6-acre lot; taxes $14,600; listed at $795,000, 7 weeks on market (Brokers: Mancini Realty; Randolph Properties)

$535,000 141 Hunter Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 15-year-old house; porcelain-tiled entry hall, powder room, family room, fireplace, eat-in kitchen, dining room, 2-car garage; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $12,929; listed at $549,000, 14 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$190,000 222 Martling Avenue 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 36-year-old co-op; foyer, dining room, balcony, hardwood floors, pool, tennis, parking, corner unit; maintenance $700, 45% tax deductible; listed at $175,000 (multiple bids), 13 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; DeCecchis)

$368,000 351 Pemberwick Road (Hawthorne) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,055-sq.-ft. condo in an 8-year-old colonial-style building; dining area, fireplace, large deck overlooking a rock garden, 2-car garage; common charge $188; taxes $2,926; listed at $372,000, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; Preferred Properties)

$544,000 179B Park Street (Park View) 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,040-sq.-ft. town-house condo in a 21-year-old complex; entry foyer, dining room, eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces, 1-car garage, tennis courts, private access to park; common charge $101; taxes $4,595; listed at $539,000 (multiple bids), 7 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$785,000 12 Center Street 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 50-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, marble baths, c/a, 2 fireplaces, side porch, 2-car garage, 0.55-acre lot; taxes $6,454; listed at $785,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; William Raveis)

$630,000 42 Thunder Lake Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 17-year-old colonial; dining room, family room, sun room, large deck, finished basement, 2-acre lot; taxes $7,182; listed at $659,000, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: Hastings; Realty Seven)

$379,000 36 Buckingham Meadow Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 15-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, basement, fireplace, pool, 2-car attached garage, .75-acre lot; taxes $9,700; listed at $384,000, 26 weeks on market (Brokers: Coach Realtors Setauket; Cornell Petsco)

$815,000 32 Old Farm Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 49-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, attic, 2-car attached garage, pool and tennis club, 140-by-295-ft. lot; taxes $8,600; listed at $950,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Trylon)

$365,000 953 Cliffside Avenue 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 38-year-old split-level; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, 2-car attached garage, 65-by-110-ft. lot; taxes $7,300; listed at $389,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Jan Kalman)

$320,000 33 Rock Road 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 80-year-old colonial; living room with fireplace, eat-in kitchen, dining room, partially finished basement, 75-by-150-ft. lot; taxes $6,840; listed at $329,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert)

$128,800 241 Bowers Street 4-bedroom, 1-bath, 23-year-old contemporary; eat-in kitchen, full basement, 1-car garage, 16-by-110-ft. lot; taxes $3,614; listed at $135,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

$392,500 341 McKinley Boulevard 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 37-year-old bilevel; eat-in kitchen, family room, c/a, patio, 2-car garage, 80-by-125-ft. lot; taxes $5,184; listed at $429,000, 7 weeks on market (Brokers: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens; Century 21)
